item.title: Mia add a quote by Katherine Dunn
item.description: "They thought to use and shame me but I win out by nature, because a true freak cannot be made. A true freak must be born." -- Katherine Dunn

item.title: Mia add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Mia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mia add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Mia add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Mia add a quote by Simone de Beauvoir
item.description: "One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman." -- Simone de Beauvoir

item.title: Mia add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Mia add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Mia add a quote by Yuna Kagesaki
Mia add a quote by Cherise Sinclair
item.description: "It's hard for an educated woman to turn her head off. That's part of the joy of being a submissive. None of the decisions are yours. When you can't refuse anything and can't even move, those voices in your head go silent. All you can do, and all you are permitted to do, is feel." -- Cherise Sinclair

item.title: Mia add a quote by Elle Newmark
item.description: "...unrequited love does not die; it's only beaten down to a secret place where it hides, curled and wounded. For some unfortunates, it turns bitter and mean, and those who come after pay the price for the hurt done by the one who came before." -- Elle Newmark

item.title: Mia add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I have to admit, an unrequited love is so much better than a real one. I mean, it's perfect... As long as something is never even started, you never have to worry about it ending. It has endless potential." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Mia add a quote by Federico García Lorca
item.description: "To burn with desire and keep quiet about it is the greatest punishment we can bring on ourselves." -- Federico García Lorca

item.title: Mia add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins
